summary: Bruno (Fabio Porchat) is a young film editor who has just broke up his marriage with Regina, and returned living in his mother's house. Drowned in deep sorrow, something very weird happens ... See full summary »
cast: Fábio Porchat|Irene Ravache|Marcos Veras|Luis Lobianco|Giovanna Lancellotti|Marcelo Valle|Sílvio Matos|Letícia Lima|Camillo Borges|Kim Archetti|Simone Mazzer|Micheli Machado|Flavia Reis|Rodrigo Sauzo
title: Entre Abelhas
